attributes.action: Hold a referendum to decide whether or not digital ID cards should be introduced
attributes.additional_details: The introduction of digital ID cards is a serious issue and should be decided by the British public via a referendum.
attributes.background: Hold a public referendum to decide if the UK should have digital ID cards.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
